conbody.p: event streamsdescriptionYou can use the event framework in any pipeline where the event handling logic suits your needs. When configuring the event stream, you can add additional stages as needed, but you cannot merge the event stream with a data stream.

There are two general types of event streams that you might create:
Task execution streams that route data to an executor to perform a task.
Event storage streams that route data to a destination to store event information. You can, of course, configure an event stream to perform tasks and store events by routing event records to both an executor and a destination. You can also configure event streams to route data to multiple executors and destinations, as needed.
